attributes.action: Remove Mr Bercow as Speaker of the House of Commons for a breach of neutrality.
attributes.background:
Breaching the principal of neutrality, Mr Bercow has randomly, unjustifiably & hypocritically insulted the President of the USA, our greatest ally, at a time when he has extended the hand of friendship. 

He should be replaced with someone suitable for & capable of doing the job properly.

rejection.details:
There is no mechanism for the removal of a Speaker during a Parliament. Other than at a general election, the Speaker can only stop being Speaker through resignation or death.

If you like, you could sign the petition below, which asks the House of Commons to debate a vote of no confidence in the Speaker:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183279
